text: @realDonaldTrump @catturd2 @Twitter They can say it all they want, but WE THE PEOPLE know what is what. Dem's are going to do their damnedest to rig this election (proof of the COVID-19 bs), and WE THE PEOPLE will be voting at the polls in November. They ain't doing us any favors, why should we do for them?
